title: Magnetic field - two long current-carrying wires

content.question: Two long current-carrying wires with current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math> directed out of the page are positioned a distance <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math> from each other. Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math> is located a distance <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math> from each of two current-carrying wires, as shown in the figure. What is the magnitude of the net magnetic field at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, times I, and denominator pi s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub 0, end sub, times I, and denominator 2 pi s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the square root of 2, end root, mu sub 0, end sub, times I, and denominator 2 pi s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the square root of 3, end root, mu sub 0, end sub, times I, and denominator 2 pi s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the square root of 3, end root, mu sub 0, end sub, times I, and denominator 2 pi s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>μ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
